markdown_content:
## Partnership Overview

Remidio, an Indian medical technology company, has partnered with Iceland's RetinaRisk, a healthcare technology provider, to implement AI-driven screening solutions for diabetic retinopathy.

## Key Objectives

* Improve early detection of diabetes-related eye complications
* Enhance management of diabetic retinopathy
* Implement screening solutions across both India and Iceland

The collaboration aims to leverage the technological expertise of both companies to advance healthcare outcomes in their respective markets.
